summary: Provides runtime compilation utilities for CUDA (and HIP) source code, including error encapsulation, NVRTC program management, compiler invocation, source preprocessing, version detection, and caching of compiled kernels.
business_intent: Enable just‑in‑time compilation of GPU kernels within CuPy, offering flexible backend support, performance gains through compiled‑kernel caching, and seamless integration with CuPy's device and function infrastructure.
